categories: Category:Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carriers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Squall was a Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At some point, the cruiser-carrier was involved in a battle above a city-covered, terrestrial body, fighting alongside TIE/sa bombers against a group of RZ-1 A-wing interceptors. The vessel was equipped with sublight engines and four hangar bays, and measured 340 meters long.
The Squall was first mentioned in the Imperial Light Carrier Expansion Pack, a 2017 expansion for Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: Armada, on a card of the same name.
